website_summaries.verdict: A large undermount sink that's easy to clean and has a classic design that will dress up any room.
pros: Stain resistant and easy to clean
Classic look that won't go out of style

customer_reviews.title: Great sink nice and deep
customer_reviews.text: Sink arrived quickly. I did a very close inspection for any flaws, as other reviews had complaints. None.. Installed in 60x22" granite top and it looks outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Ann Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Another great pruchase! The last set of decolav sinks we loved and this style is wonderful as well. Plumbers putry was required on the lower section of the drain fitting as the the bottom is not that straight. No big deal and I think this was more related to the type of drain I used vs the sink itself. At the end of the day, one step forward in my project and a satisfied spouse! 😁
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. One was easily installed with no issues, but the other two have drain holes that are not quite round. I should have read more of the reviews. Really disappointing because the sinks are beautiful and they were already mounted to my new granite counters before this problem was discovered
customer_reviews.author: Amber Streeper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product for a Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: The sink looks great and is a perfect size for my bathroom vanity. It was shipped quickly and was securely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: This came in great order - no flaws or variations in the material between the two units. They are deeper than they look. The installation was seamless. They work and function great, all of which make this a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sink
customer_reviews.text: Perfect undermount sink that goes beautifully with my new granite counter top. Color matches the tub and other fixtures I already had in my bathroom so it looks really nice and is deeper in the middle so plenty of room for washing without getting water all over the place. The price was great too so really good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled our downstairs guest bathroom and our kids bathroom with two sinks and we used the Decolav sinks in both bathrooms and I must say, they look fantastic! They are a fraction of the cost compared to the Kohler sinks and the quality seems great! There were also negative reviews on the Kohler sinks not totally draining and we've had no problems at all with our sinks draining. Would definitely recommend this sink - the rectangle shape definitely gives a more contemporary/updated look than the standard oval sink.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in CA

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Absolutely love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Absolutely love this sink. Installed in re-modeled cottage bathroom. Cottage was shutdown this past winter.and I am anxious to see how sink survived cold. Shouldn't be a problem but I have heard of cheap sinks cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sinks
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. Definitely would purchase again and highly recommend. They look great in our bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sink of what I consider to be a very versatile design. I think the sink can be applied to both classic and contemporary designs as its clean lines can be defined by its surroundings. We have 3 of these sinks in our house and have been very pleased with the product and its ongoing maintenance. They are very easy to clean. Regarding other comments on packaging, the packaging left a lot to be desired but ours arrived safely and so we were satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement for a bathroom vanity and this was a perfect match
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Two words: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four sinks from Amazon. Two had uneven porcelain at the drain and the third had a crack in the overflow drain. We only noticed these issues after the sinks we're installed. Called dacolav customer service and they failed to help in any way. Poor product quality, poor customer service. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Swapnil Pandit

customer_reviews.title: Decent undermount for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love that this undermount sink is so deep - I love the size of this particular undermount. However, like others have mentioned, the drain is not properly aligned. I was fine with it since my bathroom was built from scratch, and I had my plumbing adjusted to match the drain; but if you are buying this to replace the sink near an existing plumbing, it could be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: iLLuSiOn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with granite top
customer_reviews.text: Well made, looks very nice mounted under granite - see photo.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Bet U  can't but just one !
customer_reviews.text: So far a worthwhile purchase, attractive looking sink. Installed without issues in both sinks (got 2)
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: We have this sink in our other bathroom we remodeled and loved it so much we got it for our new add on bathroom edition.
customer_reviews.author: Amy BB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE DECOLAV Sinks!
customer_reviews.text: As with other reviewers, we ran across this sink while looking at the identical Kohler model. We purchased two of the Decolav's for our master bath which was being renovated. They are gorgeous! We compared the Decolav sink with the Kohler - apples to apples. Identical. Such a great find!
customer_reviews.author: TXBookReadingMom

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came in broken as the box didn’t have any protection for such a fragile item. The color though is the exact tone of my existing toilet. Which is the only reason I have reorder a new one. Is big and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 for a remodel and very well made and good size
customer_reviews.author: CYu

customer_reviews.title: Look Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these several months ago for the new house I'm building. I supplied them to Great Floors, which was cutting my marble vanity tops; they had no problem installing them, and they look great; plumber had no problem installing Decolav drains, and they look well as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Exile

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sinks are the perfect size for both our master double vanity and the kid's double vanity. Nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Item cracked but box well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Product was cracked...but I didn't open and inspect when received...my bad! So I am beyond 30 day return policy. Have to order another sink at additional expense.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl V.

customer_reviews.title: Great depth & modern style
customer_reviews.text: Just want I wanted, love the shape & depth and really enjoy undermount!
customer_reviews.author: Briton13

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sinks! Came packaged well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sinks. Good sizes. packaged well for shipping. I bought 3 and love the size.
customer_reviews.author: 🇺🇸MZ🐇

customer_reviews.title: Nice deep bathroom sink!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our bathroom remodel, and love them. They are a creamy color that blends well with any decor. They are deep - I love this, but you do loose some storage space under the sink...very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lmartzke

customer_reviews.title: great sinks
customer_reviews.text: sinks came looking great. Caused a sl issue w/ the granite install because they are a little deeper than the "norm", or at least that what the installers said. I still think if they had measured right it wouldn't have been an issue. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chunkychen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Love the white color
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 5 old sinks. Looks great. Love the white color. Nice construction.
customer_reviews.author: UT Houston, TX

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these sinks. They arrived in good condition. They drain well and look lovely with my 5 ft granite vanity top. I feel like I am in a hotel whenever I step into my bathroom. These were a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: vanity sink
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these sinks as replacements for our bathroom renovation. We really like the form and style of these sinks, yet are disappointed that one of the sinks is pitted in places. Did notice the pitting until the sink was installed. And it's not bad enough to go through the hassle of uninstalling. That's the reason for the 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: H. D. Vonfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because there are not six. These sinks installed beautifully, and are as fine a quality as any out there at twice the price. They were packaged extremely well, and shipped fast. I ordered well after close of business Monday; they were on my doorstep Thursday. Decolav, Wayfair and Amazon are a great combo.
customer_reviews.author: BH in WV

customer_reviews.title: Love the sink!
customer_reviews.text: I think this sink looks more expensive than it costs. People who see it really like the shape. It's been installed for 1 month and I don't have any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: EM in WA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This sink is exactly what I was looking for. Although I had reviewed the measurements the sink is much deeper than I anticipated- which is good for shaving or splashers. Have received compliments on it. The reason for giving it 4 stars is that the logo seems off center. To us not a huge deal but to others could be a deal breaker. I posted a pick so you can see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. Shows very well in our remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Artur

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this sink for aboot a year now. It was installed under a 37" x 22" granite counter-top and is just gorgeous. It is deep and sized perfectly for a bathroom sink. The square design is modern and sleek. The porcelain is durable and is holding up quite nicely. I would recommend this sink in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four sinks and they were installed without any problems. They look great! They are a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is a great size. Not tiny like some and a nice deeper depth. It is quality and very pretty. Great for our master bath remodel. We have a double vanity, and thus 2 sinks. It turned out gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sink....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink at a fantastic price...A good as kohler but way cheaper...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Verporter

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but seems a little warped so the water pools ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but seems a little warped so the water pools on one side--the pitch to the drain hole isn't right.
customer_reviews.author: ,Melanie Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink if your plumbing is crooked to match the misaligned drain holes
customer_reviews.text: I should have trusted the previous review that mentioned this issue. I returned it and bought an American Standard. I don't recall the price difference, but the quality will remain with us for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. King

customer_reviews.title: The price was too high.
customer_reviews.text: The price is higher than Homedepot, I was trust web site, so I bought it. The quality is good, but you can get it from homedepot for much lower price. Because price too high, so I gave for 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SanJose_Joe

customer_reviews.title: shipping nightmare
customer_reviews.text: the product was beautiful. the shipping and packing method was horrific. Smashed into hundreds of pieces. Not protected in shipping. Watch out if you are trying to meet a deadline. Return was very easy and hassle-free though.
customer_reviews.author: delairdesigner

customer_reviews.title: Should have never left the Chinese factory
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and one had the name (logo) embedded in the porcelain glaze running downhill so much, it was the first thing one noticed. The other had pits in the porcelain glaze. These were seconds by anyones definition. The design and size were what the owner wanted, however, the owner wants first class stuff.
customer_reviews.author: howard l weston

product_meta.title: DECOLAV 1402-CWH Callensia Classically Redefined Rectangular Vitreous China Undermount Lavatory Sink with Overflow, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Decolav gives vitreous china vessels and lavatories a distinct 21st century feel with our Classically Redefined Collection. Each skillfully crafted piece is double fired and glazed for durability and stain resistance. Compatible with DECOLAV Drains 9295, 9297, or with any standard drain
feature_bullets: Rectangular ceramic undermount sink with overflow
Product Dimensions: 20.39-inch W by 14.48-inch D by 8.26-inch H
Easy to install. Compatible with DECOLAV Drains 9295, 9297, or with any standard drain

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
